Metadata.Title: Silverlake Operation - 001: The Sweep
Metadata.Description: Hello 47, we have received a contract from a unique shadow contractor.According to our intel the operation within the underground has a few civilian operatives who coordinate behind the scenes to facilitate the ongoing experimentation.We cannot provide you with much help and the contractor wishes for this operation to be discreet. Elimination must be done quickly and efficiently with minimal disruptions to buisnesses in the area.Good Luck 47.
